des:
1. About the game:-

It is a Capital Game of world various countries where users can play a quiz game and face the world's countries' Capital questions. 
Here, we provide the world with various Capital questions that help users know about the world's various countries and their Capital cities by a fact after every question.
Here, we unlock 5 questions each day. 
It is also available for Alexa display-supported devices.
You can also set a reminder as well.

2. Features:-

Interactive sounds are available for better engagement of customers.
Users can also enjoy this game on Alexa display-supported devices.
Collections of wanted and most popular questions definitely interact with you to play one or more times.
Reminder added.
Improved visual experience added.
GUI card (Alexa app)
save user progress to start the game where they left off.

3. How to play:-

 just say, Alexa, open country capital game (for starting the game) 
 you also can follow the example phrase as well. 
for the reminder, you can say, (reminder, set a reminder, etc.)
for the leaderboard, you can say, (leaderboard or my ranking)

4. Score guide:-

 correct answer = [according to question]
 wrong or don't know = 0 points
 final score after completing's day added to the leaderboard

5. Shopping actions:-
 This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.

6. Game stats:-
 now users are able to check their stats playing.
 In this way it includes total score, total answered questions, wrong answers, correct answers, and skipped answers. 
On the basis of correct answers, it evaluates your final percentage.
Just say my stats or results etc.

7. Reach to us:-
 If you have any queries or suggestions about the game, you can reach us at info@akskills.com

8. Add routines:-
this allows customers to play the country capital game by adding a Daily routine. To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:
• On the Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
• Click + to add a new routine.
• Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
• Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
• Choose "Your Skills" - Select country capital game
• Choose Device to perform the routine - SAVE.



Thanks in advance for giving your support to us.

Note: give reminder permission in your Alexa app. Follow the Alexa app for editing reminders after a successful reminder is created.
